My amendment said – hey, FAA – follow the rules so we can move forward and stop wasting taxpayer dollars.

1286737987972272133.text: I believe that government red tape and bureaucracy should not be able to hold up important infrastructure projects. POTUS agrees, which is why he traveled to ATL last week to announce new rules to streamline the NEPA review process without compromising environmental protections.

1286737986399481856.text: The amendment was pretty simple. It would have required the FAA to utilize the review processes already laid out by NEPA instead of creating a non-standardized review process. The FAA is supposed to follow the NEPA review process but has worked outside of those guidelines.

1040675296624762881.text: Currently pharmacists are often contractually prohibited from telling patients when there is a cheaper out-of-pocket alternative to medications covered under insurance. This is known as a gag clause. As a result, patients may be paying more for their prescriptions than warranted.

1040675295639072769.text: This week @HouseCommerce approved my legislation to prohibit "gag clause" provisions.
